alert.note: Alert for Howard (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 12:26PM CDT until July 29 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR WESTERN RANDOLPH...CHARITON...LINN...GRUNDY...WESTERN SULLIVAN... SOUTHERN MERCER...NORTHERN HOWARD...NORTHEASTERN SALINE... SOUTHWESTERN MACON AND EASTERN LIVINGSTON COUNTIES... At 1226 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Princeton to near Linneus to Keytesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Brookfield, Fayette, Marceline, Milan, Slater, Salisbury, Glasgow, Princeton, Brunswick, Keytesville, Bucklin, Meadville, Laclede, Armstrong, Linneus, Wheeling, Browning, Spickard and Galt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
